data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 2,848,716 lost in Bhavnagar that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 31,684 believers in the county of Bhavnagar into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Turkmen people.
Father, it’s possible most of the 2,813,767 lost people in  Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.section_summary:
the county of Bhavnagar, Gujarat, India has a population of 2,880,400.

We estimate Bhavnagar has 31,684 people who might know Jesus, 34,949 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,813,767 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the county of Bhavnagar against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

location.name: Bhavnagar
location.people_groups_list: Kadia Kumbhar, Salat Chamta, Karadia, Shenva (Muslim traditions), Brahmin Nagar
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kadia Kumbhar (11,000), Salat Chamta (600), Karadia (43,000), Shenva (Muslim traditions) (300), Brahmin Nagar (109,000)
